answers.text:
The following are performance metrics from San Mateo and Napa County, CA. The performance measures may be more aligned with building staff as opposed to inspectors. Here is the link for San Mateo: http://www.cityofsanmateo.org/index.aspx?NID=1667. 
Attached are metrics from Napa County along with contact information. I hope this helps as a starting point.
